hint.text: The x-axis signifies the match number and the y-axis signifies the predicted score and the actual score.

solution.text:
We know, the predicted and actual scores were the same in the 5th match.
Draw a perpendicular to the y-axis from point E.
This value reflects the score in that match which is _{n}_ runs

content.text:
A1=(1,_{j1}_), A2=(1,_{j2}_), B1=(2,_{k1}_), B2=(2,_{k2}_), C1=(3,_{l1}_), C2=(3,_{l2}_), D1=(4,_{m1}_), D2=(4,_{m2}_), E=(5,_{n}_), F1=(6,_{o1}_), F2=(6,_{o2}_), G1=(7,_{h1}_), G2=(7,_{h2}_)
Specify the score in the match where the actual score and predicted score were the same.
